name: META SYNTH
description:
Explore an interactive sonic playground of noise experiments! Dash around triggering sounds and generating space friendly music.

Discover 3D generative music! 100% original music in every Jam Seed - stream and share music making with your friends.

Built using only Metasounds in UE5. No samples or external audio sources.  I applied my Modular Synthesis workflow so you can enjoy playing a modular system in 3D space without learning how to modular. :)

Enjoy playing the game that jams! Can you find the Easter Egg? :p

Please Share and Have Fun!
@shapenoise
